## About

I'm Jack Krebsbach, and I'm currently pursuing a degree in Mathematics with a concentration in Statistics at Hope College in Holland, MI. I use data analysis and statistical learning methods to solve problems. I also enjoy learning about software development.


This is my portfolio showcasing various machine learning, data science, and data analysis problems I have worked on over the years.
